code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RecentlyViewed=_ref=>{let{articles}=_ref;if(!articles||articles.length===0){return null;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-8 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg shadow-md p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100 mb-4",children:"Recently Viewed"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-4",children:articles.map(article=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:article.url,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"block group hover:bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700 rounded-lg p-3 transition-colors duration-200",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-start space-x-4",children:[article.urlToImage&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:article.urlToImage,alt:"",className:"w-16 h-16 object-cover rounded",onError:e=>{e.target.style.display='none';}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex-1 min-w-0",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100 group-hover:text-blue-600 dark:group-hover:text-blue-400 truncate",children:article.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-xs text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400 mt-1",children:[new Date(article.viewedAt).toLocaleDateString()," \u2022 ",article.source.name]})]})]})},article.url))})]});};export default RecentlyViewed;
